name: Touchy Fishy
description:
Touchy Fishy is an experimental piece of art that shines a spotlight on contemporary problems of feline lifeforms.

---

Seriously though. This is my first game. Like... ever. That's why some stuff is weird and glitchy and will never be fixed.  I could have changed the cat's sprite so it does not magically grow and shrink when it changes directions, but I didn't. Instead I consider this project to be finished and am thankful for everything it taught me. 

It's a game! Made in Unity! By me!

Off to the next one.
